job.title: Cellular Software QA Engineer
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brJoin the Wireless Technologies and Ecosystems WTE team and be part of an outstanding team of engineers working with multifunctional teams to drive innovation and develop products used by millions worldwide We are looking for a highly reciprocal individual who can excel in a highpaced environment Be ready to make something extraordinary when you come here Dynamic encouraging people and innovative industrydefining technologies are the norm at Apple The people who work here have reinvented and defined entire industries with our products and services The same real passion for innovation also applies to our business practices  strengthening our dedication to leave the world better than we found it You should join Apple if you want to help deliver the next amazing Apple productbrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong br10 years of validation experience in wireless and telecoms industrybrbrDeep knowledge Cellular Radio technologies protocols and procedures 5G NR LTE etcbrbr8 years of handson experience with testing cellular technologies 5G LTE IMS etcbrbrExposure to commercial test simulators and test systems such as Anritsu RS Keysight call boxes for lab validationbrbrValidated ability to lead a complete functional area of an application or productbrbrAble to work independently and should be dedicatedbrbrValidated understanding of SQA methodologies amp practicesbrbrExcellent communication amp interpersonal skillsbrbrComfortable with solving problemsdebuggingreproducing issuesbrbrScripting skills in any of the following Perl Python Shell JavaScript RubybrbrThrive in a collaborative environment and can clearly communicate while expertly driving multiple projects across many teamsbrbrObsessively hardworking and inquisitive and seek to tackle everyday problems in innovative waysbrbrLaserfocused on the smallest details that are important to our customersbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brApples Wireless Technologies and Ecosystems product software team is seeking a hardworking highly motivated and focused engineer to develop new testing methodologies and establish divisionwide standards for use On this job you will develop expertise in new domains and establish test methodology and develop test concepts to enable delivery of extraordinary quality You will work on problem solving and evaluate solutions in different layers of the SW stack taking into account their completeness and impact to the system As part of this team you have a very immediate impact on the user experience of Apples wireless devices worldwidebrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brBachelors in Electrical Engineering or Computer Science or equivalentbrbr brRole Number 200262783brbr
